Text: yeah... could we please have the SKY coverage???!! its less a question of whose coverage is better, and more a concern over consistency... if i watch 75% of the grands prix covered by SKY, and 25% covered by BBC, its inconsistent... i'd rather watch coverage from a single source throughout the season... and since SKY holds the rights to the majority of the races, SKY it has to be... right???
Sky are upped later, because of some SKYBox copyright thingy.. REad about it at one of the earlier F1bbc torrents..
And.. Please, Seed, you have the show, but we dont.. And we want to see it toooooo :)

adupre you are a jerk: the torrent's title says BBC so why request Sky here???

Thank you IAMH67 & seeders!
